description: When Mayme Taylor went to the bar for a drink, she ordered claret&nbsp;lemonade. But when it arrived, it was not as strong on flavor as what she expected, with little gingery spice or smokiness present in either taste profile. This is where the Mamie Taylor cocktail comes into play!
name: Mamie Taylor
